title: Actidil 60ML Elixir
details:
Actidil Syrup formula includes Triprolidine Hydrochloride. This triprolidine hydrochloride is also known as its active ingredient. It has a strength of 1.25MG per 5ML. Actidil Syrup blocks the acetylcholine present in the body. 

READ MORE
precautions: Tell your doctor if you are allergic to any medicine before this helps the doctor know your medical history. Actidil will take early 4 to 5 hours to get into action. Always take your medicine with some supplement. Taking medicines empty stomach can make you get sick, and the stomach is directly affected. This syrup should be kept in a tightly sealed container with temperatures 15-degree centigrade to 30-degree centigrade.Do not use alcohol if you are taking this syrup because along with alcohol, the impact of this syrup will result in drowsiness and dizziness.  In pregnancy or breastfeeding, take your doctor's advice.
effects: In some people, the side effects of actidil syrup are none, but in some cases, there are a few side effects that were noticed. The symptoms associated with this medicine are very common and easy to tackle. These side effects are dizziness, drowsiness, dry mouth, throat, and nose. This can also cause excitability, thickening of mucus in the nose or throat. In some very sensitive people, there are some serious side effects that can be seen. These side effects include sore throat, severe fever, getting fatigued without doing anything, numbness, abnormal bleeding. If any of you feel any serious symptoms call or visit your doctor immediately. Ignorance in such cases can lead to serious health issues.

effects: Cetrizine (anti-histamine) effectively treats allergies in babies but in some cases, it may show adverse effects.Gixer syrup 60ml (by Barrett Hodgson Pharmaceuticals) can cause the following side effects and adverse reactions in children;DrowsinessMay severe the underlying conditions i.e watery eyes, rashes, itching, etcDifficulty in breathingDifficulty in urinationAbdominal painBloating/gas/indigestionVomiting and Nausea, etcIf you see any of these unwanted consequences in the child after giving cetirizine 60ml syrup, immediately discontinue the medication and seek a healthcare service.

title: Leviva 60ML Syp
details: Leviva syrup contains an active ingredient "levocetirizine HCL" which is an antihistamine drug and used to treat allergies.
precautions: Keep it out of the reach of children. Store it below the room temperature i.e. below 25 degrees Celsius. Consult a doctor if you’re hypersensitive to any of its ingredients. Do not take overdose, always take it in a recommended dose.
effects: No side effects are reported. Consult a doctor if it causes digestive problems i.e. gas, bloating, abdominal pain, GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease), vomiting, nausea, or diarrhea, etc. Allergic reactions may occur i.e. skin itching, rashes, irritations, redness, & inflammation/swelling, etc. Other effects are drowsiness, dizziness, sleepiness, headache, etc.

title: Phenergan 120ML Elixir
details:
Phenergan syrup is an antihistamine indicated to treat allergic reactions or hypersensitivity. It comes with the generic name of 'promethazine' and belongs to the group of drug class 'phenothiazine antiemetics.' The syrup alters the actions of ce

READ MORE
precautions: The precautions are necessary to scrutinize before taking any syrup. The precautions of Phenergan syrup are listed below.It is not recommended to use the Phenergan syrup if you are hypersensitive to its active or inactive ingredients.Inform your doctor of your medical history.Avoid using the Phenergan syrup if you have uncontrol movements of any body part like eyes, arms, or legs.Avoid driving or using machines as it causes dizziness and sleepiness.Do not drink alcohol while using the Phenergan syrup.Inform your doctor of your previously prescribed medication to avoid drugs interaction.The medicine is not recommended for children under 2 years of age as it can result in bronchospasm.Do not use Phenergan syrup if you are suffering from a respiratory disorder, asthma, or obstructive pulmonary disease. Inform your doctor prior to using the Phenergan syrup if you have a history of seizures.Do not use the medication without a doctor's prescription if you have an eye disorder like glaucoma.Inform your doctor if you have liver or kidney-associated problems.Notify your doctor if you have a weaker immune system.Enlarged prostate and stomach ulcer conditions must be told to your physician before using Phenergan syrup.Do not use the syrup if you are a patient of a cardiac disorder.Do not use Phenergan syrup if you are pregnant or planning to be, as it can affect the fetus.Do not use syrup if you are breastfeeding.Place the medication in a safe place.Keep Phenergan syrup away from the reach of children.Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Asthma, Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease-COPD, Sleep apnea, Bone marrow depression, Glaucoma, Irregular heartbeat, Hypertension, Liver disease, Neuroleptic malignant syndrome, Reye's syndrome, Seizures, Blockage, Ulcer, Hyperthyroidism, Difficulty urinating due to enlarged prostate.
effects: Phenergan syrup can cause some minor and major side effects. It is not necessary that the patient will experience all of them. The possible Phenergan syrup side effects are described below.Extreme drowsiness.Difficulty in breathing;Lightheaded feeling and headache.Confusion. Agitation. Hallucinations. Nightmares.Seizure or convulsions.Irregular heartbeats.Jaundice resulting in yellowness of the skin or eyes.Unrestrained muscle movements of the face, lips, smacking tongue, eyes blinking, or frowning.Easy bruising and bleeding like nose bleeding or bleeding gums.Fatigue and weakness.Ill feeling.Fever and chills. Sore throat and mouth sores. Red and swollen gums.Trouble swallowing.Rigid muscles.Sweating.Confusion, drowsiness, dizziness is most common among adults.Some Common Phenergan syrup side effects seen in many people include the following:Drowsiness and dizziness;ringing or voices in ears.Double vision.Feeling nervous.Dry mouth.Feeling of tiredness.Sleeping problems (insomnia).Inform your doctor straight away if you encounter prolonged and severe adverse effects.

title: Avil 50MG Tab 2x50 (L)
formula:
Pheniramine Maleate Inj, Syp & Tabs
Sanofi
details:
With the change in weather, allergies are on the rise. Be it skin allergies or influenza; both can be quite unpleasant and troublesome. Those who usually suffer from allergies know that it can render you utterly dysfunctional and irritated.

READ MORE
precautions: Before taking any medications, several precautions must be taken to avoid any mishaps or health hazards. Medications are taken carelessly often prove fatal and can even cause death in some cases.Avil tablets must not be consumed on an empty stomach, with alcohol, during pregnancy, or breastfeeding. It should not come by men who suffer from an enlarged prostate gland. Otherwise, it may cause pain while urinating. Individuals with asthma, bronchitis, increased eye pressure, and cardiac disease should inform their physician of appropriate prescriptions or dosages. The use of medicine should be avoided before or during driving, as it can cause sedation. In the case of an underlying liver or kidney disease, a physician should be consulted first.Avil must not be combined with the following drugs, as it could prove fatal; MAO inhibitorsSedativesAntibioticsRelaxantsNarcotics or alcohol.Cortisol The medication must be taken on time and as prescribed by the doctor to avoid overdose, which may result in tremors (shivering or vibrations in the body) and even seizures.
effects: Some tablets do not sit well with individuals for various reasons. Hence they might cause unease or side effects varying from person to person. These side effects may be due to some underlying health conditions, conditions under which they are taken, or reactions with other medications that one might be consuming. However, these side effects range from mild to chronic and must be taken into account to ensure the safety of health. Avil tablet side effects usually include drowsiness, decreased or irregular heart rate or bradycardia, lack of coordination, sleepiness, sensations of nausea. The side effects might get extreme in the case of avil tablet overdose or reactions. Such side effects include decreased motor ability like confusion, extreme dizziness and hallucinations, and palpitations. If the side effects do not subside, become extreme, or if one has overdosed, then the physician must be immediately contacted even in the case of no apparent side effects, or the individual may be rushed to the nearest hospital.

title: Zyrtec 10MG Tab 2x15 (L)
details:
Zyrtec tablet is an effective tablet that is used to treat the allergies like irritation of the eyes, itching of the skin, watery eyes, itching of the throat, sneezing, skin rash (hive) and running nose. The generic name of the Zyrtec is Cetirizi

READ MORE
precautions: Before taking medicine, the following are the points to consider:while using machinery be careful: Despite the fact that cetirizine doesn't generally cause sleepiness, a few people react differently when using it, particularly in the first few dosages.Checking of the ingredients: Before using the Zyrtec tablet, do check the ingredients used in it as some people may have an allergic reaction to it or are hypersensitive. Additionally, avoid cetirizine in case any patient is allergic to an antihistamine that carries hydroxyzine.During pregnancy use caution: Before using this tablet, consult a doctor or talk to the health care provider if the patient is pregnant or breastfeeding. Well and effectively controlled studies tell using this tablet is generally safe and is protected during pregnancy.It is examined and acceptable generally. Controlled examinations in pregnant ladies show no proof of fetal danger. If a pregnant woman accidentally takes medicine ought not to create any harm or consequences for the baby (embryo).Consult a doctorIf the patient has any kidney and liver disease so they should get some information from them about taking Zyrtec, they may suggest taking not more than the usual dosage but less than it.Moreover, for diabetes patients, caution is advised, as the fluid products may contain sugar. Get some information from a pharmacist or doctor before using it safely.CautionTry not to drive your vehicle or use any machinery, till the patient should be sure about how their body will react to this medicine.The patient should avoid narcotics, tranquillizers, and alcohol due to the higher risk of tiredness and drowsiness. However, it may cause depression; people should avoid mental alertness activities until acquainted with medicine.Renal debilitation and hepatic use caution. It will be more sensitive for elderly people.Before using the tablet to treat yourself, it is very important to read all the directions on the tablet package. If still there is any confusion about it, it is necessary to consult any pharmacist. If any doctor has prescribed this tablet so should take it as suggested.
effects: Every medicine has its side effects; the side effects of the Zyrtec are:feeling abnormally sleep (Drowsiness)Feel tired all day (Tiredness)Dryness of mouthStomach pain especially in ChildrenVomitingDiarrhoeaheadacheweaknessBleeding of noseSour throatCan cause dizzinessCan cause fatigueLow blood pressureIf the condition is getting worse, then the patient should consult a doctor.

precautions: Temperature Do not store this medicine at a temperature above 30 degrees Celsius. If this medicine has been kept at a temperature above 30 degrees Celsius, then it should not be consumed. Heat and moisture Keep this medicine away from direct sunlight, direct heat, and direct moisture because it will badly affect this medicine. Away from minors This medicine should be kept away from children and minors. This medicine should not be given to the kids.Rigix in Pregnancy There is a study done on pregnant women using Rigix Tablet. So this is why it should not be given to pregnant women.
effects: Apart from the positive effects of the rigix tablet, there can be some adverse effects of Rigix as well. The major side effects of consuming Rigix Tablets are as follows. Dry Mouth As rigix medicine 10 mg contains cetirizine dihydrochloride, it can cause dry mouth. Drinking plenty of water after consuming this tablet can help get rid of dry mouth.Drowsiness Drowsiness and tiredness of the most common side-effect of Rigix. The patient's body will feel tired after the consumption of rigix tablets.Stomach Pain Stomach pain is not a very common side effect of Rigix. This side effect depends on the metabolism of the patient. Mostly people having weak metabolism, and children might feel stomach pain after consuming Regix Tablet.
